basic.description:
{Basic Sorcery}

Causes a hero's spells to inflict an additional 7% damage in combat and increases power skill by 1

advanced.description:
{Advanced Sorcery}

Causes a hero's spells to inflict an additional 17% damage in combat and increases power skill by 2

expert.description:
{Expert Sorcery}

Causes a hero's spells to inflict an additional 23% damage in combat and increases power skill by 3
